IDK what it is about amazon sweaters, but they are always long in the sleeves and short on the torso. I've gotten several amazon sweaters in different styles and materials and they are all made like this.  I wish they would trade some arm length for torso length.  The colors are nice at least.

It’s a cotton sweater, been washed a couple of times, dried on medium, hasn’t shrunk yet.  Perfect for spring.  More than a tee shirt but not quiet a heavy bulky sweater.

Of course it’s not amazing since it’s so cheap. Materials used are thick and somehow pretty flimsy, but it gets the job done. I haven’t had any thread problems since it’s stayed together pretty well for the two months I’ve had it.  I do like how it’s somewhere in between casual and dressy due to the texture of the fabric. You can feel and see the knit to some degree. Far from cashmere, far from a sweatshirt, pretty much right in between.
Not worth it. Might as well spend more and get something that wont rip apart.
